ygData.subject: Newbie - which version to use?
ygData.msgSnippet: As a newbie, which version should we get going on? I have been trying out version 1.14 and got a few crawls working. I was then looking at 3.0 due to the fact

As a newbie, which version should we get going on?

I have been trying out =
version 1.14 and got a few crawls working.

I was then looking at 3.0 due t=
o the fact that some of the new features sound interesting (like scalable r=
e-crawls), and figuring that is where most of the development effort is hea=
ding.

That said, I'm having much more trouble getting going with the Docum=
entation in 3.0 (especially how to configure the XML) and I feel like I'm g=
uessing at things and trying them out way to much (where as 1.14 was fairly=
 straight forward to get going on).

Also, I was getting NPE exception with=
 3.0 RC 1, and had to go to a nightly build, which then worked.


What is t=
he scoop?

Thanks!
Lance
